freedays.util
Class DateUtils

java.lang.Object
  freedays.util.DateUtils

public class DateUtils
extends Object

Utility class used for date generation & manipulation.' NOTE: Investigat: problems with Gregorian Calendar conversion of DAY_OF_WEEK => switched to Calendar.

Author:
fmacicasan

printShortDate

public static String printShortDate(Calendar date)
Transforms a Calendar instance in it's textual representation based on a default short format : td.tm
    example:
  • 04-22-2011 -> 22.04;
  • 12-13-2010 -> 13.12

Parameters:
date - a Calendar instance to be printed
Returns:
the textual representation of date

dateDifferenceInDays

public static long dateDifferenceInDays(Calendar start,
                                        Calendar end)
Computes the difference in days between the two provided Calendar instances.

Parameters:
start - the starting day of the period
end - the ending day of the period
Returns:
days between start and end
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if one of the dates is null or start is greater than end
